channel.title: Packing my client
channel.description:
I don't know if you're allowed to offer money for a fix but I really need to pack my client successfully so I can make it installable, exactly like 2speced's client and most others on Rune l0kus. I've tried Ric's signed jar tutorial but when I try to run my jar file, Java appears for 2 seconds in my processes and then disappears. I'm using a Battle Scape source and I really need this done by today
Please help me!
My AIM is Disulfiramx If you don't have AIM contact on here for another form of instant messaging.
thank you very much!
Fat Cookies edit: no buy/sell = no money
